title: Ticket #4299: Make Condor_gangliad output more useful
description: The current metrics for ganglia provide to much information, much of it not too useful. The point of this work is to change the default configuration to have a few metrics that are very useful to monitor and/or troubleshoot a HTCondor pool.
remarks:
2014-Jun-20 09:04:06 by bbockelm:
Hi Tim,

Any time we can sit down and discuss these? I noticed that you have moved the most useful metrics for monitoring the schedd into verbosity 2.

Brian

2014-Jun-23 13:49:10 by tim:
We had a meeting with infrastructure and selected the most useful metrics for verbosity 0. Things pushed out of verbosity 0 were put into verbosity 1. Things formerly in verbosity 1 are now in verbosity 2.
